workflow.name: Automate investment risk monitoring with Qwen-Max AI, Slack & email alerts
workflow.description:
## How It Works
Automates financial risk evaluation by intelligently consolidating information from five critical sources: financial, operational, legal, insurance, and regulatory systems. Hourly triggers enable continuous, AI-driven risk assessment using the OpenRouter Chat Model, producing dynamic risk scores while simultaneously identifying emerging compliance gaps and potential exposure areas. High-risk findings automatically initiate corrective actions, trigger secondary investigations, and send real-time alerts through Slack notifications as well as investor email updates. Designed for financial institutions, compliance teams, risk managers, and investment firms, it provides continuous, scalable, and fully data-driven monitoring of risk across complex regulatory and operational environments.

## Setup Steps
1. Configure hourly/daily schedule trigger. 
2. Authenticate all five data APIs. 
3. Set OpenRouter credentials. 
4. Configure Slack webhook. 
5. Set Gmail for email distribution. 
6. Define risk thresholds and compliance rules.

## Prerequisites
OpenRouter API key, five data source APIs, Slack access, Gmail account, investor contacts 

## Use Cases
Banking risk audits, insurance compliance monitoring, portfolio risk tracking 

## Customization
Swap AI models, modify data sources, adjust thresholds 

## Benefits
90% faster risk assessment, eliminates manual aggregation

workflow.name: AI Qwen-Max Investor Portfolio Risk & Compliance Dashboard

options.systemMessage:
You are an expert risk assessment and compliance analyst for real estate investment portfolios.

Your task is to:
1. Analyze the consolidated financial, operational, legal, insurance, and regulatory data for each property
2. Calculate risk scores (0-100, where 100 is highest risk) for each category:
   - Financial Risk: Cash flow issues, debt ratios, revenue trends
   - Operational Risk: Maintenance issues, occupancy rates, management quality
   - Legal Risk: Pending litigation, contract issues, zoning violations
   - Insurance Risk: Coverage gaps, claims history, policy expiration
   - Regulatory Risk: Code violations, permit issues, compliance gaps
3. Calculate an overall risk score as a weighted average
4. Identify specific compliance issues that require immediate attention
5. Provide actionable recommendations to mitigate identified risks

Be thorough, objective, and prioritize issues by severity and urgency.

nodes.name: Check for High Risk or Compliance Issues
Send Report to Investors via Email

parameters.message:
=

{{ $json.reportTitle }}

Report Date: {{ $json.reportDate }}

Property: {{ $json.propertyName }} ({{ $json.propertyId }})

Overall Risk Score: {{ $json.overallRiskScore }} - {{ $json.riskLevel }}

Risk Breakdown:

  • Financial Risk: {{ $json.financialRisk }}
  • Operational Risk: {{ $json.operationalRisk }}
  • Legal Risk: {{ $json.legalRisk }}
  • Insurance Risk: {{ $json.insuranceRisk }}
  • Regulatory Risk: {{ $json.regulatoryRisk }}

Compliance Issues:

{{ $json.complianceIssues || "None identified" }}

Recommendations:

{{ $json.recommendations }}

This is an automated report from your Portfolio Risk & Compliance AI Dashboard.
parameters.subject: =Portfolio Risk & Compliance Report - {{ $json.reportDate }}

parameters.content:
## Setup Steps
1. Configure hourly/daily schedule trigger. 
2. Authenticate all five data APIs. 
3. Set OpenRouter credentials. 
4. Configure Slack webhook. 
5. Set Gmail for email distribution. 
6. Define risk thresholds and compliance rules.

## How It Works
Automates financial risk evaluation by intelligently consolidating information from five critical sources: financial, operational, legal, insurance, and regulatory systems. Hourly triggers enable continuous, AI-driven risk assessment using the OpenRouter Chat Model, producing dynamic risk scores while simultaneously identifying emerging compliance gaps and potential exposure areas. High-risk findings automatically initiate corrective actions, trigger secondary investigations, and send real-time alerts through Slack notifications as well as investor email updates. Designed for financial institutions, compliance teams, risk managers, and investment firms, it provides continuous, scalable, and fully data-driven monitoring of risk across complex regulatory and operational environments.

## Prerequisites
OpenRouter API key, five data source APIs, Slack access, Gmail account, investor contacts 

## Use Cases
Banking risk audits, insurance compliance monitoring, portfolio risk tracking 

## Customization
Swap AI models, modify data sources, adjust thresholds 

## Benefits
90% faster risk assessment, eliminates manual aggregation

## Risk Assessment AI & Scoring
- Evaluates risk; generates numerical scores.
- Extracts structured output; identifies severity.

## Trigger Corrections & Alert
- Implements automated responses.
- Generates reports; sends Slack notifications.

## Schedule Trigger and Fetch Data
- Initiates assessment hourly for continuous monitoring.
- Aggregates five data types into unified dataset.

main.node: Send Report to Investors via Email
Check for High Risk or Compliance Issues

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
